heroDescription: Check URL redirects, expand short links, and monitor domain accessibility - all in one place.

children.text: Our suite of free tools helps web developers, SEO professionals, and digital marketers analyze URLs, check redirects, and ensure website accessibility. All tools are instant, free, and require no registration.

faqs.question: What tools are available?
faqs.answer: We offer a redirect checker to analyze URL redirect chains, a short URL expander to reveal destinations behind shortened links, a domain block checker to verify China accessibility, and uptime monitoring for domain availability.

faqs.question: Are these tools really free?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our tools are completely free to use with no registration required. You can check unlimited URLs and access all features at no cost.

faqs.question: Do I need to create an account?
faqs.answer: No account or registration is needed. Simply enter your URL and get instant results. All tools work directly in your browser.

faqs.question: How do I check if my redirects are working correctly?
faqs.answer: Use our redirect checker tool to analyze your URLs. It will show you the complete redirect chain, response times, status codes, and identify any issues like redirect loops or chains.

faqs.question: Can I check multiple URLs at once?
faqs.answer: Yes, our bulk redirect checker allows you to analyze multiple URLs simultaneously, making it easy to audit entire websites or batches of links.
